text: Sọ fún àwọn olùsásẹ́yìn fún ogun nínú àwọn Lárúbáwá oko pé: "Wọ́n máa pè yín sí àwọn ènìyàn kan tí wọ́n ní agbára ogun jíjà. Ẹ máa jà wọ́n lógun tàbí kí wọ́n juwọ́ jusẹ̀ sílẹ̀ (fún ’Islām). Tí ẹ̀yin bá tẹ̀lé àṣẹ (yìí), Allāhu yóò fun yín ní ẹ̀san t’ó dára. Tí ẹ̀yin bá sì gbúnrí padà gẹ́gẹ́ bí ẹ ṣe gbúnrí ṣíwájú, (Allāhu) yó sì fi ìyà ẹlẹ́ta-eléro jẹ yín
